summary: The Daily Telegraph, often called The Telegraph, is a famous British newspaper started in 1855. It's known for important news stories, like the start of World War II and a big political scandal in 2009. The paper changed from being moderately liberal to conservative over time. It has a Sunday version called The Sunday Telegraph. Both papers work separately but sometimes share stories. The Telegraph is like a record of important events in the UK.
title: The Daily Telegraph
